hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found in #the Market#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Space, space, wanna go to space, yes, please space. Space space. Go to space.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: Remember when Ganon was a blue pig?^I remember.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #stable#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Carpenters' Boss House#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to the #Forest Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Compass# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #the Sun's Song#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #time#.

ToT (Left).text: Did you know that the Boomerang instantly stuns Phantom Ganon's second form?

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #0# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.
